member.name: P:Avanteam.Directory.Identity.ApsSignInResult.HasPasswordExpired
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indication whether the sign-in was successful but password has expired.
member.value: True if the sign-in was successful and password expired, otherwise false.

member.name: T:Avanteam.Directory.Identity.ApsUserManager`1
member.summary: Implementation of that add business logic needs required by the Avanteam Process Suite.

member.name: M:Avanteam.Directory.Identity.ApsUserManager`1.GetUserAsync(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal)
member.summary: Returns the user corresponding to the IdentityOptions.ClaimsIdentity.UserIdClaimType claim in the principal or null.
member.param: The principal which contains the user id claim.
member.returns: The user corresponding to the IdentityOptions.ClaimsIdentity.UserIdClaimType claim in the principal or null.

member.name: P:Avanteam.Directory.Identity.ApsUserStore.ErrorDescriber
member.summary: Gets the for any error that occurred with the current operation.
